articles.content: In the UAE, though Covid cases are visibly going down, doctors are reminding parents and families not to drop their guard and ensure kids are protected at all times.Dr Geetika Dheer, paediatrician at… [+2444 chars]

articles.title: There are myriad ways covid can affect the heart: Dr Arun Kalyanasundaram, Promed Hospital, Chennai - ETHealthworld.com
